resources.string: This represents an instant app, containing a feature for showing cacti information in a RecyclerView. When this instant app is closed, it will be wiped from the device.
A large genus of small succulent plants. They generally resemble miniature aloes, mainly in their petite appearance.
These are the largest subfamily of the cactus family, Cactaceae. They grow from 1 cm 20 meters in height.
Similar to the Cactoideae, these are another family of the cactus family, Cactaceae. Prickly in appearance.
This succulent lives solely off of moisture in the air, and sunlight. Its inner gel can heal burns.
Native to Central America, this succulent is similar to the air succulent - its gel can heal burns and skin wounds.
